post.body: I knew a silly thing like bronchitis wouldn't keep you from finishing.
pink robots. are you drinking liquor or something?
Good night!!
My thoughts and prayers are with you and your family!
What is GH? :)
WOOHOO! Party time!! Yes?
There was football today?
Woohoo!!
Hahaha!! That was good. Thanks, I needed a laugh!
ITUNES? ITUNES? Have I not taught you well? ITUNES?!
I was wondering where you have been! :)
Did I mention it's cold? Can feel cold coming in thru windows even tho heater is on. Need someone to cuddle up with in front of fireplace.
Happy cuz fb is updating again when I text to twitter. Woohoo. Don't have to type msgs twice. Helps with cutting down the carpal tunnel.
Baby it's cold outside. It's 2 degrees and snowing. About 4 inches. Can you say BRRRRR!!??!!
Calling it a day from rates setup. Tired and in pain. Gotta love carpal tunnel.
Working on rates while half watching Thursday night NBC shows.
My horn can pierce the sky!
Not sure if my FB is updating from my tweets.
Awake at 8 am on a Saturday. :( Have to work on rates, started late last night, but it's not working out for me.
Tired. Slept but not well. Could use a few more hours of sleep.
Ugh! It happened again. As much as I try, I just can't get back to sleep. Now I gotta get up and try to get ready for work.
Oh no. I woke up n its 5:30. Last time I did that I couldn't fall back to sleep until 2 am the next day. Ugh!!
Gonna try to sleep. Hopefully I can. Going to honor da Daily Camera with my presence in the morning. Hope that thought don't keep me awake.
Played my first game of the new Madden NFL game. I SUCK!
Woohoo!! Just found out that my Pookie actually reads my blog!!
Wow, it is way too white outside. There is a few inches of snow. Probably ice too. I'm staying home.
Wondering what the hell is wrong with my bro...he just threw a snowball at me...IN MY BEDROOM!!!
It's Friday night and I am going to sleep all weekend!! Woohoo!! Well, I hope I do.
For some reason, feel like watching the muppets christmas special on hulu instead of going to work. Anyone wanna come over, I got popcorn.
Wondering why people make fun of holiday sweaters? I think everyone should wear one for Christmas. Don't get me started about fruit cake!
Wondering why I can't win the PowerBall Lotto so I can give up getting up early on mornings like today when everything just hurts.
Feeling like Scrooge. Having bad 6-8 weeks with being sick. Trying to get into Xmas spirit but with no money for gifts, it just sux. :(
Sleepy even tho I finally slept more than 2 hours, abt 6. Still kept waking up but would fall asleep immediately. That's an awesome thing.
Confused n depressed abt stuff. Ain't life grand...NOT!
Feeling hot in this warm 4 degrees weather. Must be the heater.
It's a warm -1 this morning. Should I go to work or stay in bed?
Wishing someone would bake me a cookie!
Finished watching "I am Legend" a while ago. So the moral of the story is don't find a cure for cancer?
Wondering if I can buy the CO U.S. Senate seat for $1? $2? Or is that in Illinois only?
PAIN!! Arms are on fire from typing all weekend.
Oh boy, calling it a day. Sick of rates. Really tired and in pain. And it is freezing!! It has to be in the negatives.
Weather watcher says it's -17. Dang that is cold!!!
Tired. Gonna take a break from rates. GO COWBOYS!!!
Dang it's cold. Temp keeps going between 1 and 2 degrees.
Man, I totally forgot there was NFL today! Not sure I would have watched so it's all good.
Just finished web cam session with Jen! My 1st web cam experience. Just need a microphone so I don't have to type so much.
IMing and web camming with Jen.
Listening to...yeah, you guessed right Madonna!! Woo Woo!!
On my way to work for the 1st time in 2009. Things will change next week, much earlier start....5:30 am. Can u believe that?!?!
Grooving to the sweet music of Madonna!!
OMG!! They are showing Elf for 24 hours!! I love it. Hope everyone has a safe and happy new year!!
MS thinks its an issue with Zune internal calendars not being able to handle leap years. WHAT?? Since when does this crap have a calendar?
AUGH!!! STUPID %&@*+!? CALENDAR SETUPS!!!! HOW MANY TIMES DO I NEED TO ENTER THIS CRAP SO IT WILL ADD IT TO THE SYSTEM!!!
Man, I turn on my Zune and it won't boot, freezes on logo. Turns out ALL 30gb Zunes are having issues. Dammit MS, don't make me go Apple!
On way to work. Wind on Mon took out sections of fences around neighborhood. Supposed to be windy tonight with gusts at 80+ MPH.
Having hard time trying to get out of bed to go to work. Can you see how upbeat I am at the thought?
Finished Month End for today. More tomorrow. Listening to bro's list of music. Gonna go to sleep. No howling wind so hopefully will sleep.
I think the winds have died down to about 40 MPH. But who cares, I'm working from home! Heck, I'm still in my cozy warm bed. :)
Having hard time sleeping with wind blowing so hard. I really thought my window was going to break a while ago. News says 60+ MPH gusts.
